      • getClearingPriceNeededToEnrollForSection

        public static java.math.BigDecimal getClearingPriceNeededToEnrollForSection(java.lang.String courseStr,
                                                            java.lang.String sectionStr)
        Returns the minimum price needed to be bidded by the student to ensure that he gets a spot within the remaining biddable vacancies. In the front end, this should be updated, upon a change in the DB state by another user. Prompt user press the "refresh" function for the rankings to be updated before submitting their bids.
        Parameters:
        courseStr - the particular course
        sectionStr - the particular section
        Returns:
        a BidDecimal of the clearing price

      • addBid

        public static boolean addBid(java.lang.String userId,
             java.math.BigDecimal amount,
             java.lang.String courseStr,
             java.lang.String sectionStr)
        Add the bid to the sudden_death table, when it meets the clearing price (Transaction-based).
        Parameters:
        userId - userId of the user
        amount - the amount bid
        courseStr - the course
        sectionStr - the section
        Returns:
        a boolean whether the bid has been added
